entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
